title: T206 McGraw Cap Portrait SGC 50 left for sale
author: bn2cardz

posts.post_title: T206 McGraw Cap Portrait SGC 50 left for sale
posts.post_content:
Scan is prior to the encapsulation of the card.  If you need a photo of the card in the SGC case that can be provided, but this scan shows the detail better so that you know what you are getting.

[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/t206ATZSCsub350Fact2501small_zps2035f8a4.jpg[/IMG]
Atz, Sweet Caporal 350SGC 60/5, $125 - Sold

[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/T206Dougherty_SC_VG4mc_frnt.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/T206Dougherty_SC_VG4mc_bck.jpg[/IMG]
PSA 4(MC), On this rarer version of the Sweet Caporal Back you can see a second back peeking through on the right side.  $80 - Sold

[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/t206McGrawHipPied350-460sub2501small.jpg[/IMG]
Now resides in an SGC 10 case, $45 - Sold

[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/t206MitchellPied350sub252name2fact01small.jpg[/IMG]
In an SGC 35 case, Shows Name on top as well as Factory number showing on top reverse.  Also has a nice printer's mark on bellow the photo on the front. $50  - Sold

Mitchell and Dougherty Sold.

Added card for sale:

[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/t206McGrawHatPied350-460sub2501small.jpg[/IMG]
Card now resides in an SGC 50 case.  [S]$210[/S] [S]$200[/S] Pending sale at $175

McGraw glove at hip and Atz are now spoken for.
The McGraw cap is still available.
I will take offers on the McGraw cap.
Including the SGC scans of the McGraw.  The price is lowered to [S]$200[/S]. Accepted Pending offer $175.
